articles.title: Google joins Samsung in working with iFixit on a self-repair program - The Verge
articles.description: Google has partnered with DIY repair specialists iFixit to offer spare parts for its devices. Pixel smartphone parts like batteries, displays, and cameras, will be available to purchase in the US, Canada, Australia, the UK, and Europe.
articles.content:

articles.title: Standalone Australian GP is "too tough" on F1 teams - Russell - Autosport
articles.description: Mercedes driver George Russell believes having the Australian Grand Prix as a standalone event is "too tough" on Formula 1 teams amid a 23-race season.
